sentences.en: A new excitement is only an additional satiation.

sentences.en: Eating slowly will help ensure that you can hear your body's satiation signals.

sentences.en: Hunting is usually initiated by hunger and stopped by satiation.

sentences.en: Practice portion control and eat slowly to the point of satiation, not fullness.

sentences.en: The film is satiation, hard, gloss. The application is convenience.

sentences.en: The physiological feedback of feeling full or the satiation signal comes with a time lag.
sentences.cn: 生理上的对于食物的饱腹感或满足感都是以时间作为参照的。

words.tran_cn: 充分满足；使饱享（sate的过去式）
